verses.verse: And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto him all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H3548>him<s%>, and the priests, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%>: and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by a <S%H5982>pillar<s%>, and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%> and all their <S%H5315>soul<s%>, to <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> to the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the second <S%H4932>order<s%>, and the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>door<s%>, to bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and for the <S%H842>grove<s%>, and for all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and he <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H2351>outside<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6939>Kidron<s%>, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of them unto <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el.

And he put <S%H7673>down<s%> the idolatrous <S%H3649>priests<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>ordained<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the places round <S%H4524>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; them also that burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, to the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and to the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, and to the <S%H4208>planets<s%>, and to all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And he brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H842>grove<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H2351>outside<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron<s%>, and stamped it <S%H1854>small<s%> to <S%H6083>powder<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H6083>powder<s%> there upon the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And he broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H6945>sodomites<s%>, that were by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, where the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H707>wove<s%> <S%H1004>hangings<s%> for the <S%H842>grove<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> all the <S%H3548>priests<s%> out of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had burned <S%H6999>incense<s%>, from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H884>Beer<s%>–sheba, and broke <S%H5422>down<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> that were in the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, which were on a <S%H376>man<s%>'s left <S%H8040>hand<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> came not <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, but they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

And he <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth<s%>, which is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, that no <S%H376>man<s%> might make his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech<s%>.

And he took <S%H7673>away<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> that the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, at the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, by the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H5419>Nathan<s%>–melech the <S%H5631>chamberlain<s%>, which was in the <S%H6503>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And the <S%H4196>altars<s%> that were on the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the upper <S%H5944>chamber<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, which the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altars<s%> which <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, did the <S%H4428>king<s%> beat <S%H5422>down<s%>, and broke them <S%H7323>down<s%> from <S%H7993>there<s%>, and cast the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of them into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron<s%>.

And the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which were on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H4889>corruption<s%>, which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6253>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%>, and for <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%>, and for <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%>.

And he broke in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H4676>images<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H842>groves<s%>, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H4725>places<s%> with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was at <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, and the high <S%H1116>place<s%> which <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, who made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>, had <S%H6213>made<s%>, both that <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the high <S%H1116>place<s%> he broke <S%H5422>down<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the high <S%H1116>place<s%>, and <S%H1854>stamped<s%> it small to <S%H6083>powder<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H842>grove<s%>.

And as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H7200>himself<s%>, he spied the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> that were there in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> out of the <S%H6913>tombs<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H2930>polluted<s%> <S%H1697>it<s%>, according to the word of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%>, who <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H6725>monument<s%> is <S%H1975>that<s%> that I <S%H7200>see<s%>? And the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H6913>him<s%>, It is the tomb of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let him <S%H3240>alone<s%>; let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5128>move<s%> his <S%H6106>bones<s%>. So they let his <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H4422>alone<s%>, with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that came <S%H935>out<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And all the <S%H1004>houses<s%> also of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that were in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, which the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> to provoke the Lord to <S%H3707>anger<s%>, <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> took <S%H5493>away<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> to them according to all the <S%H4639>acts<s%> that he had <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el.

And he <S%H2076>killed<s%> all the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that were there upon the <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H6106>bones<s%> upon <S%H7725>them<s%>, and returned to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6213>Keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

Surely there was not <S%H6213>held<s%> such a <S%H6453>passover<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> that <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, nor in all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, nor of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;

But in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, where this <S%H6453>passover<s%> was <S%H6213>held<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Moreover the workers with familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, and the <S%H8655>images<s%>, and the <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and all the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> that were <S%H7200>spied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, did <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> put <S%H1197>away<s%>, that he might <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which were <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> that <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And like unto him was there no <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>him<s%>, that turned to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with all his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and with all his <S%H3966>might<s%>, according to all the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; neither <S%H310>after<s%> him arose there any like <S%H6965>him<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> not from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%>, with which his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, because of all the <S%H3708>provocations<s%> that <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had provoked him <S%H3707>with<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> also out of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, as I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will cast <S%H3988>off<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of which I <S%H559>said<s%>, My name shall be <S%H8034>there<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%>–nechoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>: and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>; and he killed him at <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, when he had seen <S%H7200>him<s%>.

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> carried him in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6900>tomb<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4427>him<s%>, and made him king in his <S%H1>father<s%>'s place.

<S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H3841>Libnah<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, according to all that his <S%H1>fathers<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

And <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%>–nechoh put him in <S%H631>bands<s%> at <S%H7247>Riblah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, that he might not <S%H4427>reign<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to a <S%H6066>tribute<s%> of a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%>–nechoh made <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in the room of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> <S%H3947>away<s%>: and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and died <S%H4191>there<s%>.

And <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; but he <S%H6186>taxed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: he <S%H5065>exacted<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, of every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H6187>taxation<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto <S%H6549>Pharaoh<s%>–nechoh.

<S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2080>Zebudah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%> of <S%H7316>Rumah<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, according to all that his <S%H1>fathers<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.
